title: Query Tracking for UBI
description: Version X.Y.Z; last updated 2024-05-23.  A query made by a user should include these attributes for UBI tracking.

query_id.description: The unique identifier of a query, typically a UUID, but can be any string.

user_query.description: The query as the user entered it.
user_query.$comment: Currently not required to support recommendation systems etc that might not have a user generated query.

query_attributes.description: Any query modifiers like filter choices or pagination. Other attributes such as experiment identifiers that need to be tracked with the query.
